parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Saves the variables stored in [[profileNamespace]] to the persistent active user profile. 

* '''Warning''': this is a file operation, which makes it expensive! It is not recommended to do this at a high frequency in a loop for example. It is however also recommended not to change a large amount of variables and wait long before saving, because certain game crashes may cause a loss of data. 

* '''Warning''': saving a lot of data can quickly increase the size of the profile variables file, so keep an eye on this.

* '''Warning''': TKOH's Heliport status (used in the Career mode for example) is stored in this file, so be mindful of working with this technology to avoid losing data and progress. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''saveProfileNamespace'''</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>saveProfileNamespace;</code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[profileNamespace]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">Unknown
<dd class="note">Variables are also saved when the game is quit.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
